title: Inside Agent

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Appear friendly to a player. They will receive a false notification that you are winning with them. You may optionally select a role that might have created this message. You may choose to create a private chat with them. 2 uses.
- Learn a player's true role.
- Stab a player during the day. You may only stab an unfriendly player once.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You may not keep a last will.
- You may disguise/hide your kills' cause of death. You may also choose whether it resolves immediately or at the end of the day.

desc:
Post 3069
*Never trust anyone. Including yourself. Especially yourself.*
